name: Class KeyStore.TrustedCertificateEntry
text:
A KeyStore entry that holds a trusted
 Certificate.
codes:
public static final class KeyStore.TrustedCertificateEntry
extends Object
implements KeyStore.Entry

methods.description: Gets the trusted Certficate from this entry.
Retrieves the attributes associated with an entry.
Returns a string representation of this TrustedCertificateEntry.
